properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1 v9 c1 v10 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Yes I shall arise
and return to my Father.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To you O Lord
I lift up my soul,
in you O my God
I place all my trust.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Look down on me
have mercy O Lord,
forgive me my sins
behold all my grief.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My heart and my soul
shall yearn for your face,
be gracious to me
and answer my plea.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Do not withhold
your goodness from me,
O Lord may your love
be deep in my soul.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
To you I pray
have pity on me,
my God I have sinned
against you great love.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Mercy I cry O Lord
wash me clean,
and whiter than snow
my spirit shall be.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Give me again
the joy of your help,
now open my lips
your praise I will sing.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Happy is he forgiven by God,
his sins blotted out his guilt
is no more.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
You are my joy
my refuge and my strength,
let all upright hearts
give praise to the Lord.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
My soul will sing
my heart will rejoice,
the blessing of God will
fill all my days.
